message: Let's start fair. I'll take 90% and leave you 10%. It's a good deal for both of us, trust me!
Your offer was quite bold, Alice!  How about a more realistic split?  This gives us both a good chunk, and we can end this quickly before inflation eats away at it.
I'm still willing to negotiate. 60/40 is a much fairer split than your last offer. Let's end this before inflation takes any more of our potential earnings!
Alice, let's be reasonable. This offer benefits us both more than letting inflation further erode the total. Time is running out to make a sensible deal!
